title: preview thumbnails tab
content:
Hello, first sorry for my english... I'm looking for how to have a large thumbnails of an open tab, just by passing the mouse cursor over it. I tested a multitude of add-ons but each time the image is too small and it requires a new window

I specify that I under: System: MacOs browser: firefox 83.0
creator: jlughetto

title: Bookmark Icons
content: Some of my bookmarks still have default icons after I have opened them. Is there anyway I can fix this because it really makes my bookmark toolbar look weird.
creator: zacharygutstein
